entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Nordegg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:24 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. High 16. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
